titleStmt.title: Three sermons vpon the sacrament of the Lords Supper. By the late faithfull and vvorthy minister of Iesus Christ, Iohn Preston, Dr. in Divinity, chaplaine in ordinary to his Majestie, master of Emanuel Colledge in Cambridge, and sometimes preacher of Lincolnes Inne
titleStmt.author: Preston, John, 1587-1628.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Cotes, for Michael Sparke, and are to be sold at the blue Bible in Greene Arbor,

notesStmt.note: Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: [A]² B-M⁴.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
